title: Episode 174: Bible John
description:
This week we are diving into a horrific fellow and the three murders attributed to him. Alaina gives us the gory details of all three murders, which some people think may not have all been committed by the same person. We’ll talk through the possible suspects, motives and idiosyncrasies of the man coined Bible John.

Sources:
https://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/news/scottish-news/how-notorious-killer-bible-john-12078716
https://www.vice.com/en/article/5947e5/the-mystery-of-bible-john-scotlands-zodiac-killer

https://medium.com/@JohnWil/the-search-for-the-still-unidentified-serial-killer-dubbed-bible-john-ae786aeafda1
